title: $1.6 Billion Powerball Jackpot Sets Off Ticket-Buying Frenzy
description: The odds of getting the winning numbers are 1 in 292.2 million, but that did not dash the hopes of players ahead of the drawing on Saturday.
dc:creator: Amanda Holpuch and Johnny Diaz

media:content.media:description: The estimated $1.6 billion Powerball jackpot is the largest in U.S. history.
